posts.post_content:
Hey all:

I know, I know its the wrong forum but just trying to hit more folks.

This is in the prelim, but I need to gauge an interest if there is any. I made this poster of the entire set, all 168 cards including the 13 variations and 8 type 2s plus the OP backs to make an even 170. In the end, there were 6 cards I could not get images for and photshopped the differences, I just wanted the poster. Somehow the file wound up half the size and there is an ever so slight blur.

I want to redo this, reacquire all the images and hand them over to a profession print shop that would produce the poster. It would be printed on thick poster paper, glossy, and have been professionally built as a file removing imperfections I couldn't dream of removing. It will be the same poster seen but even sharper. The poster would be 24 x 30", $45 shipped in a tube and I need around 20 orders to actually make this work, no need for any money yet as I'm trying to gauge interest. Any thoughts and/or opinions are appreciated.
